tasks.label: Auto Git Commit & Push
tasks.command: git add . && git commit -m 'Auto-sync: ${input:commitMessage}' && git push origin main

tasks.label: Quick Auto Push (timestamped)
tasks.command: git add . && git commit -m 'Auto-sync: $(Get-Date -Format 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss')' && git push origin main
